The `sppois` package exists to provide spatial autoregressive 
```{r setup}
library(sppois)
```

```{r crime-sppois}
crime_sppois <- sarpoisson(crime_i ~ income + home_value, data = columbus_crime,
                           listw = columbus_neighbors, method = "fiml") 
```

```{r}
summary.sarpoisson(crime_sppois)
```
